listing.listing_description:
Located in Sotogrande, on the Costa del Sol, this Spanish luxury home enjoys its secluded lifestyle, while being just a short drive from the excitement of Estepona, Marbella, and Gibraltar. Perfect for a family vacation, retreat with colleagues, or a sunny getaway with a group of friends, Villa Sotoasis features five luxurious en-suite bedrooms, and numerous indoor/outdoor lounge areas to accommodate your group of ten. Nearby, you’ll find sandy beachfront, local shops, and several world-class golf courses.

From the exterior, Sotoasis shows off modernized Caribbean architecture with its spacious veranda, clay-tiled roof, and numerous openings to the lush lawns and gardens of the backyard. Inside, the villa is sleek and stylish. With areas like the indoor swimming pool and sauna, the home theatre, and the grand piano lounge, it's easy for Sotoasis to show off its luxurious side. By the indoor pool, the wet bar and lounge is another relaxing place to enjoy group activity or break away for more intimate occasions. In the kitchen, you’ll appreciate the exceptionally spacious layout, functional workspaces, and restaurant-caliber stainless steel appliances.

Outside, you’ll find lounge areas, with seating for the whole group, throughout the yard-length covered terrace. The back lawn, leading to the swimming pool, is vibrant green and perfect for a special outdoor event. There’s also an alfresco dining set and barbecue on the terrace. Back inside, Sotoasis is equipped with Wi-Fi and a home office to help keep you connected. And, there’s a gym with state of the art fitness equipment, great for keeping up with daily routines.

The nearest beach to Sotoasis is Playa de Torreguardiaro, about twelve kilometers from home. There, you’ll find calm waters and vibrant urban surroundings. If there’s a golfer in your group, Real Club Valderrama is consistently rated among the world’s best courses, and, although it’s a private members club, visitors are welcome. In its rich history, Valderrama has hosted numerous PGA events, and it is a must-play for any golf aficionado.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find peace and tranquility at this modern-Moroccan home just outside of Marrakech. Let the full-staff, including a chef and spa therapist, cater to your every desire. Work on your tan while gazing upon views of the Atlas Mountains. Catch up on some reading by the fireplace while the kids splash around in the indoor pool. When you’re ready for some action, take a chauffeured ride to Jemaa el-Fna.

Stroll through gardens decorated with olive, orange, and lemon trees around Casa de Noor’s classic Moroccan-style exterior. Flow inside, barrier-free to relax in the poolside living room, hammam, or atop a massage table. Pick up something fresh from a local market for a backyard barbecue, inevitably to be followed by a dip in the pool. At night, sip cocktails on the rooftop terrace while you enjoy the mountain view. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the home gym is ready, or, you could use the indoor pool’s lounge area for a yoga session.

Marrakech is an up-and-coming golf destination, with substantial investment over the last few years in expert course revitalization, and new courses popping up all the time. PalmGolf Marrakech Ourika is a desert-style course with incredible views of the Atlas Mountains. After, head into town for some shopping at the Souks, a wander through the Medina, or a tour of Musee de Marrakech. If you need a break from the city, stop in at Jardin Majorelle, a beautiful garden gifted to the town by designer Yves Saint Lauren.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Whimsical artwork and a high standard of luxury make Dar El Sadaka a truly unique retreat. Set on 25 acres of private gardens in the heart of Marrakech, this exceptional vacation rental was conceived by a visual artist and bursts with both beautiful natural scenery and man-made personality. Reserve its nine bedrooms for a family reunion, intimate destination wedding or simply a stylish getaway with up to seventeen friends.

In keeping with the long tradition of gracious Moroccan hospitality, your holiday at Dar El Sadaka includes daily breakfast, housekeeping and turndown, as well as the services of a chef and house staff. The villa’s grounds feature everything from a private running track, tennis court and yoga area to a ping-pong table, bocce court, children’s play area, traditional tent and sculpture garden. Relax by the pool, wander through palm and olive groves, and finish the evening at the al-fresco dining area. Inside, there are more resort-worthy amenities such as a home theater, bar, hammam and fitness room.

High ceilings, mirrored walls, sleek furnishings and incredibly lifelike animal sculptures by French artist Jean-François Fourtou give the villa’s interiors a sense of both comfort and chic. From the mischievous apes in the living room to the graceful giraffe in the dining room, the creatures are welcome reminders that you’re here to enjoy yourself. As there is chef service, the professional kitchen is limited to staff use only.

Dar El Sadaka has seven bedrooms with super king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and one with a double bed; all nine have en-suite bathrooms. All of the bedrooms have their own animal sculptures, and many have honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as lounge areas, minibars, wood-burning stoves or private gardens and terraces.

The villa’s Bab Atlas location puts you in the heart of the Palmeraie of Marrakech. From there, it’s a short drive to several other resorts, the city center, Royal Golf Marrakech and, when it’s time to leave, the airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Cape Town’s rolling seas and towering mountains stretch out before you at the beautiful Adara. As sleek and comfortable as the surrounding landscape is rugged, this luxury five-bedroom vacation rental is perfectly situated on the hillside above Camps Bay Beach in one of the city’s most exclusive suburbs. Invite family and friends to relax and take in the views, or use the villa as a base to explore some of South Africa’s most iconic sights.

Though there are oceanfront decks on each of the three levels at Adara, you’ll want to spend most of your time on the terrace by the infinity pool, which has an inviting row of lounge chairs and views of Camps Bay and Lion’s Head. A gas barbecue and al-fresco dining area make it easy to host your own braai, and in the evenings, satellite television and Wi-Fi are ready to entertain.

Bright and breezy, the great room at Adara opens to the terrace via wide sliding glass doors. White walls and a floating staircase maintain the airy feel, while wood floors and paneled walls lend warmth. There’s plenty of room to stretch out on the plush white sofas in the sitting area, the white leather seats around the long dining table or the matching white stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the bedrooms at Adara has a king bed; four of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the fifth has shared access to a hall bathroom. Wood floors and paneling, white walls and bedding, and plush area rugs make the bedrooms comfortable private retreats, while neutral-toned tile and glassed-in rain showers give the bathrooms spa-worthy appeal.

If you’re in Cape Town for a relaxed holiday or honeymoon in the sun, you’ll appreciate the 4-minute drive from the villa down to lively Camps Bay Beach and the 5-minute drive to local favorite Clifton Beach. For a more active stay, make the short drives to the Twelve Apostles, Lion’s Head or Table Mountain for a hike or cable car ride and spectacular views. Downtown Cape Town is just a 14-minute drive away, and Cape Town International Airport is only 23 km from Adara by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Live the farm life at this boutique vineyard estate set in the foothills of the Klein Drakenstein Mountains in Paarl, South Africa. Harvest your dinner from the organic vegetable garden, pair it with the perfect wine from the estate’s cellar, and dine alfresco with a mountain and vineyard background. 8 kilometers away; Paarl is where you’ll find golf, restaurants, shopping, and even more wine.

After a tour of the vineyard, head to the wine tasting room to discuss your favorites, while basking in the stately and elegant atmosphere of Brookdale. Once you’ve decided on a bottle, gather the group in the formal dining room for a special announcement. After dinner, move the party to the wet bar and lounge on the terrace, sipping cocktails as the sun sets beyond the mountains. 

At quieter times, light up the gas fireplace, curl up on the sofa and find a good movie on the Smart TV, or you could sit outside by the pool and catch up on some reading. Take relaxation to the next level in the master ensuite’s soaking tub, or kick your shoes off and wander the gardens. On-site staff includes grounds and housekeepers, and there are security cameras as well. 

After spending a night or two in Paarl, venture further west to Cape Town, Lion’s Head, and Table Mountain National Park. The area’s natural wonders are astounding, especially the view from the top of Lion’s Head, which usually takes around 90-minutes to hike. After, reward yourself with a night of shopping, bar hopping, and delicious cuisine on Long Street, Cape Town’s entertainment hub. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Lanterns glow around the lawn and pool of this colonial-style circa 1905 home on South Africa’s Kwandwe Private Game Reserve. Its traditional architecture—wood floors, high ceilings, stand-alone bathtubs—is a slice of sophistication in an untouched landscape. A full staff (and an invisible fence) will keep you comfortable in this outpost less than 2 hours from Port Elizabeth.

See the reserve’s 22,000 hectares of wilderness on game drives included in your stay. Kwandwe is the largest private reserve in South Africa—and teeming with lions, elephants, rhinos, leopards, and Cape Buffalo. Open vehicles mean there aren’t any windows between you and the animals, and day and night itineraries mean you’ll see a range of wildlife. (The area is also malaria free, so you don’t have to worry about mosquito bites.) Get even closer to the landscape on a guided walking safari or fishing trip to Galpin Dam.

Start the day with breakfast in the bush and finish with sunset drinks or a scenic dinner. The reserve puts on safaris and activities suited to children, while grown-ups can ask to volunteer at the Mgcamabele Community Centre, which serves remote Eastern Cape communities.

For a stay tailored to your group, ask about adding experiences like a rhino monitoring drive or winter walking safari, where you’ll trek through habitats by day and sleep under the stars at night. Track rhinos under the guidance of Kwandwe’s experts on a rhino conservation safari—and book a massage for when you’re back at the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hambay is an extraordinary Moroccan villa situated in La Palmeraie, a vast palm oasis just outside central Marrakech. Nestled on a lush private estate, the villa offers resort-like alfresco living spaces and spa facilities along with exquisite interiors. A corporate meeting room, private cook, and eleven bedroom suites accommodating twenty-two guests create an ideal vacation rental for special business retreats or reunions with family and friends.

An ample swimming pool terrace, lined with elegant sun loungers and beautifully aged olive trees, stretches from the villa's threshold toward a horizon of stately palms and expansive sky. Enjoy enchanting days here in the Moroccan sun, bathing in the hot tub, plunging into the pool, and sipping cool drinks in the afternoon. Host receptions or ceremonies on the lawn, and repair to the alfresco dining area, on the opposite side of the house, for home-cooked meals in the garden-scented air. Savor the sunset from the rooftop terrace with expansive views of La Palmeraie.

Broad thresholds and arched doorways allow fragrant air to circulate throughout the home. A sumptuous lounge invites you to evening cocktails, before gathering in the spacious dining room with restaurant-style seating and glass walls overlooking the garden. A meeting room with projector screen is excellent for doing business, while the villa's wellness amenities—including a fitness room, massage rooms, and Hammam—offer a rejuvenating cleanse.

The villa includes nine garden-view bedroom suites on the first floor and two suites on the second floor that open to the rooftop terrace. Nine of the eleven bedrooms have king beds and the other two have two single beds that can be converted into doubles. All of the bedrooms have deluxe ensuite bathrooms as well as safes and lovely furnishings, providing serene private settings for couples and individuals.

Hambay offers a fabulous location for exploring Marrakech. The Palace of the Bahia, Dar Si Said Museum, and El Badii Palace are all within six kilometers from your door, and Menara Gardens are about nine kilometers away. Golfers are minutes from Ryads Al Maaden Medina & Golf Resort. Marrakech Menara Aiport is just ten kilometers away, making Hambay an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Look out from a comfortable seat, taking in the ocean spray view from the balcony of this seaside Bantry Bay villa. An interior replete with marble, leather, tasteful art and an abundance of space typifies this home. Fine stone bathrooms, shaded exterior dining spaces, and a cosy media room add to the luxurious atmosphere. An enchanting waterfront, dynamic hiking, and wine country is nearby. 

Morning will bring light that slowly spreads along the seascape and shore strip that’s visible from Aurum 701’s windows. Located in the heart of the exclusive Bantry Bay suburb, the home’s exterior balcony literally hangs over the frothing surf, offering a breakfast spot with an unrivalled view. Natural light pours into the main living room, amplified by the home’s shining floors and bright interior colour scheme. Rich, welcoming bedrooms are lit by inventive, golden lamps, with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring the dramatic view can be enjoyed by resting guests.

Aurum 701’s location is one of the most enviable in the entire Cape Town region. The pleasant strip outside features a huge range of hotels and restaurants, while several excellent beaches are located just to the south, including Clifton beach and Camps Bay beach. The rocky, dynamic expanses of Table Mountain stretch above the villa, offering excellent local hiking and trailhead outings, while local bird and monkey sanctuaries are also close by. Just beyond, the sights and sounds of cosmopolitan Cape Town itself are no more than a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just a short walk from Llandudno Beach, of which the balcony has an excellent view, you’ll find Copacabana, the host of your next unforgettable Luxury Retreats vacation. Spend your days gazing upon the Atlantic Ocean, its sandy shores, and the Apostles Mountain Range, just up the coast. With five luxurious bedrooms, this villa is ideal for a family reunion, golf trip with friends, or a sunny corporate retreat. Nearby, you’ll love exploring the vibrant city center of Cape Town, just a few kilometers from home.

Copacabana’s sleek and stylish living spaces flow from one another, and out to the balcony, barrier-free, making the most of open concept layout. Throughout the villa, you’ll find state of the art electronics, elegant accent pieces, and decor that is suitable for the most formal occasion, yet relaxing and casual enough for a breezy beach vacation. In the kitchen, your inner chef will appreciate the high-end stainless steel appliances, bright and functional working environment, and center island/breakfast bar. And, Copacabana’s master bedroom is outfitted with a king sized bed, walk-in closet, private balcony, ocean view, and en-suite with a rain shower, bathtub, and dual vanity.

Outside, you’ll love the social atmosphere and ocean view on the balcony. Spaces like the alfresco dining area, games room, and swimming pool ensure there’s always somewhere fun to gather with the group. And, features like Wi-Fi and television will keep you connected, if you want.

Two great ways to get out and see the beautiful landscapes of South Africa are hiking and golfing, both of which are easily accessible in just a few short kilometers. The hike up Lion’s Head usually takes around ninety minutes. Once you've arrived at the top, you’ll be rewarded with some of the more scenic views in the country. If golf is more your style, there are several clubs on the outskirts of Cape Town, as well as Metropolitan Golf Club, which is located on the coast. For shopping, a wide range of dining, and vibrant nightlife, Cape Town’s city center is the place to be.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please Note: This villa is closed between November 1st and March 31st every year.

Fterlari Villa seems to float above the Santorini Caldera, with soaring views of the volcanic ridges and Aegean Sea. One of the island's most renowned homes, its design blends the luminous forms of ancient Cycladic culture with rustic Greek features and high-end modern amenities, including a pool and spa. Marvel at the sunset in utter seclusion or drive minutes to the age-old towns of Oia and Fira.

The lemon-yellow accents of the villa's exterior harmonize with the lush greens of the hillside and radiant blues of the sky and sea. Savor a refreshing dip in the morning light, and bask in the sun on lounge chairs facing the vast horizon. Relish alfresco meals from the wood-fire oven and barbeque, and toast the sunset with a glass of locally produced wine. Cap the evening with a hot tub soak under the vault of brilliant stars.

Arched doorways imbibe the sea-fresh air into the cool interiors. Fresh white surfaces accentuate the natural luminosity and deft touches of lemon, lime, and blue. This classic Greek palette culminates in the vibrant kitchen, where chef-quality appliances are set amid artisanal tile work. A comfortable living room welcomes ouza tastings before dinner, while the loft above the dining room is perfect for quiet afternoons or late-night relaxation.

The bedrooms are furnished with an elegant minimalism, each featuring a double bed and air conditioning. The 2 guestrooms share a bathroom, while the master enjoys an ensuite bathroom and opens to the terrace and sea views.

The villa is perched between the quaint village of Oia and the larger town of Fira (or Thera). The nearest beach is Exo Yalos, just 4.5 kilometers away. Extraordinary outdoor opportunities include hiking the caldera, scuba diving, windsurfing, and boat trips amid the islands.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just minutes from Cape Town’s many attractions, this South African vacation villa is ready to host your next amazing Luxury Retreat. With four beautiful en-suite bedrooms, a spacious interior, and lush gardens, Villa Olivia is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or an exciting vacation with friends. The landscape of Cape Town ranges from sandy beachfront to dynamic mountains, with a vibrant city and bay in between. And, you’ll be able to enjoy all of it without having to travel more than a few minutes.

Villa Olivia is a joy to explore. With its thoughtful decor and ornate detailing, you’re sure to find something new to enjoy, even a few days into your stay. The living room is decorated with comfortable designer furniture. It opens directly to the lounge area of the terrace, increasing your hosting space, and allowing fresh air and natural sunlight to fill the open concept interior. The television lounge is a little more playful in its design and the perfect setting for a family movie night. The kitchen features high-end appliances and a gorgeous breakfast bar with custom bar stools and lighting.

To make your stay as stress-free as possible, Olivia comes with daily housekeeping, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a security system, and a washer/dryer. Outside, there’s a swimming pool, alfresco dining, and sun loungers on the terrace.

A great way to start your exploration of Cape Town is with a cable car trip to the top of Table Mountain. The mountain is also climbable if you’re feeling ambitious, it takes about two-hours, and the most accessible trail is at Platteklip Gorge. From the top of the mountain, you’ll have an amazing view of nearby beaches Camps Bay and Clifton Beach, as well as the downtown area of Cape Town. Fine dining, shopping, nightlife, and museums are all easy to find in town. And, if you’re looking for an adventure, there are several companies that offer deep sea fishing, surfing, and diving excursions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Villa Anil is situated within Marbella Club, a spectacular resort on the Costa del Sol of Spain. Built in a classic Andalusian style with high-end contemporary comforts, the villa features expansive outdoor living areas, exquisite interiors including private spa facilities and a game room, and five bedrooms accommodating ten guests. With a privileged location that blends serene privacy with convenient access to the club's world-class amenities, Villa Anil is an ideal vacation rental for memorable reunions with family, colleagues, or friends.

The villa's expansive outdoor living areas invite you to enchanting days and evenings in the Mediterranean light. Step into the refreshing swimming pool and sunbathe on elegant chaise longues. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, sip Spanish wine in the lounge on the veranda as the kids play on the lawn, and gather around the table for an alfresco feast.

Wide glass doors and ample windows infuse the home with fresh breezes and natural light, while the décor offers a harmonious counterpoint of natural wood accents, fresh white finishes, and contemporary-rustic furnishings. The designer kitchen features chef-grade appliances and serves a breakfast/tapas bar and the open-concept salon, which includes a designer farmhouse dining table and ample lounge. A separate entertainment area includes a home cinema and English billiards table, while the wellness area includes a well-equipped fitness room, massage room, and sauna.

All five bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the ground-floor and upstairs rooms open to terraces. The ground-floor suite features a four-poster king bed, lounge with fireplace, and a semi-alfresco bathroom with stand-alone tub and shower. On the upper floor there are two king suites and one suite with a pair of twin beds, while the cellar houses a suite with a pair of twin beds.

Beyond your private villa, enjoy the extraordinary amenities of Marbella Club, including its spa, swimming pool, tennis center, horse riding facilities, botanical garden, and exceptional dining and nightlife, or venture a short ways to its eighteen-hole golf club, designed by Dave Thomas. The resort offers a sensational venue for weddings, corporate retreats, and other special events, and the town of Marbella is just four kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The air is perfumed with lavender and jasmine—and wine, of course—at this circa-1890 estate near Cape Town. The rugged lines of the mountains dwarf the scale of the villa’s gardens, the grounds of the boutique winery it sits on, and the house’s classic Cape Dutch facade. While oenophiles will find plenty to taste here, nearby Constantia has French brasseries, coffee shops, golf courses, and more.

 Stop to smell the private rose gardens and listen to the trickling of the fountains as you swim in the pool, sip a new favorite South African wine in the outdoor living room, sit down to an al-fresco dining table for eight, or, in cooler weather, read in the glassed-in garden room. There’s a wine cellar to supply you with fresh bottles to open while you watch the satellite-equipped smart TV, listen to the integrated sound system, and catch up via Wi-Fi.

 A holiday at this vacation rental is a way to step back in time without missing out on the luxury of today. Oregon oak floors link stately living and dining rooms with details like beamed ceilings, brick fireplaces, floor-length drapes, plump sofas, and slipcovered chairs. The fully equipped kitchen opens to a casual dining area and family room.

 The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own lounge area, fireplace, and wraparound balcony overlooking the vineyards and mountains. There’s also one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with a twin bed. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

 The St. Leger estate is a 7-minute drive from central Constantia, where you’ll find coffee shops serving excellent lattes, bakeries producing perfectly puffed macarons, restaurants expertly pairing dishes with wine, and even a sports bar showing the latest rugby. It’s also within day-trip distance of several of Cape Town’s best beaches.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Admire incredible seascapes without and stunning artwork within at Sea Lion. Filled with paintings, photographs and sculpture, this contemporary Cape Town vacation rental feels like a private gallery. Its setting in the Fresnaye neighborhood and masterful architecture combine to offer views of the Atlantic and Robben Island from every room.

Your holiday at Sea Lion begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a housekeeper and chef. A choice of landscaped terraces lets you decide whether you’d rather enjoy views of the ocean or the mountains, while sun loungers, a swimming pool and a barbecue make it easy to relax or entertain. This luxury residence also has its own exercise room, home theater, bar and wine cellar, as well as sound and security systems and Wi-Fi.

Designed by Greg Wright Architects and featured in several magazines, the villa is an incredible contemporary space. Sleek lines in the open-concept living and dining areas are countered by warm natural textures of granite, walnut and marble, and huge sliding doors let you open the space completely to the terrace. While chef service is included, there’s also a fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Sea Lion has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; together, they can accommodate up to eight friends or family members. Three of the bedrooms open to a balcony, and the fourth has its own entrance, making it perfect for an in-law suite or a honeymoon-style haven.

A location in the city’s exclusive Fresnaye area puts guests of Sea Lion within a short drive of the popular Clifton Beach and Camps Bay Beach, as well as shopping, dining and entertainment in the Cape Town city center. Be sure to bring your camera and walking shoes to explore local landmarks Table Mountain and Lion’s Head, both of which are nearby.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Savor the finer things in life—from ocean views to great beaches to modern architecture—at Halo Villa. This Camps Bay vacation rental sits in view of some of Cape Town’s most iconic sights, both on land and on the coast, and has plenty of stylish space for relaxing or entertaining. Reserve its four bedrooms for a sunny holiday with up to eight friends or extended family.

Take in views of the ocean and Lion’s Head from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, barbecue, tempting loungers and al-fresco dining for five. Store favorite vintages in the wine fridge, cozy up to the fireplace on cooler nights, catch favorite shows on the TV and sound system, or share photos of your stay via Wi-Fi.

The villa’s clean-lined architecture and glass walls let the views be the focal point of the great room. An open-concept living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen give you the luxury of gathering everyone together—and if that’s not enough room, simply slide the walls open and let the party spill onto the terrace.

Halo Villa has four bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, all of which open to an outdoor space, whether a private balcony or the shared pool area. Like the great room, the bedrooms are sleek and bright, with understated neutral tones and thoughtful details such as built-in headboards.

The villa puts the best of Cape Town within easy reach. It’s an 8-minute drive to Camps Bay beach, where you can join locals and honeymooners alike on the sand, and an 8-minute drive to Lion’s Head, where you can hike up to take in bird’s-eye views of the city. You’ll find plenty of shopping and dining options in Camps Bay, and if you’re traveling with kids, don’t miss the fascinating Two Oceans Aquarium.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
After a private elevator to the penthouse, marvel at views of the Table Mountains right before a swim in your personal pool atop Pepperclub Hotel in Cape Town. Sip cocktails beneath the chandelier, while the entertainer in your group serenades the room on a grand piano. For a slight change of scenery, hike to the top of Lion’s Head for a picnic; it’s 10 minutes away and takes about 90 to ascend.

Stately furniture, parquet floors, and extra-high ceilings set the perfect tone for a special announcement, family reunion, or meeting. Each bedroom captures breathtaking mountain views. Step outside to the balcony for your morning coffee and some fresh air. Then, sit back on the plush sofa and find a rugby match on satellite television before breakfast in the fully equipped kitchen. 

During your stay, you’ll enjoy daily housekeeping, 24-hour concierge, and security, as well as the shared amenities of the Pepperclub. Keep up with routines in the fitness and business centers, pamper yourself at Cayenne Spa, and catch a flick at the Odean Cinema. The penthouse also comes with 1 parking space. 

Once you’ve traversed the mountains, beaches, and streets of Cape Town, head to the V & A Waterfront to charter a private yacht for dinner on the sea, or a fishing trip. When you get back to land, spend the night trying out craft beers, bar hopping, and dancing in the waterfront district. For some family fun, take the kids to see the Penguins at Boulder Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Lion's Crest is a superb luxury home in the prestigious Camps Bay suburb of Cape Town, about five minutes from the beach. The three-story villa is perched on a hillside along a peaceful cul-de-sac, with breathtaking sea views in virtually every living area and bedroom. The design combines luminous contemporary interiors, lovely accents of stone and wood, superb artwork, and high-end amenities for dining and relaxation, including a gourmet kitchen and outdoor swimming pool. Four ample bedrooms—two with king beds, two with queen—accommodate multiple couples, destination wedding guests, and families up to eight in size.

The main living area occupies the middle story of the home, with an open-concept interior and balcony with panoramic views of the mountains and sea. This beautiful space is perfect for entertaining guests or relaxing with loved ones, featuring a hearth-warmed TV lounge, a corner cocktail lounge, and a dining table for eight. The sleek open kitchen is fully equipped with high-grade appliances and a breakfast bar.

A separate, indoor/outdoor entertainment area is located on the lower floor of the home, with a swimming pool, sun loungers, ample patio space, and an interior space with a lounge and braai (a classic South African barbeque). The villa also features a lovely office space beside the master bedroom. Air conditioning throughout the villa keeps you cool at all times.

The master suite features a king bed, lounge, furnished balcony with sweeping vistas, and an open-concept bathroom with shower and tub. Wall-to-wall glass doors inhale the sea-kissed breeze into the room. The primary guest suite also features a king bed, a private balcony with sea views, and an open ensuite bathroom. The other two guestrooms include queen beds and a shared bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. There is a safe in each bedroom.

Lion's Crest enjoys easy access to the cultural riches and naturals splendors of the West Cape. The beach and nightlife scene of Camps Bay are just five minutes away, and you're about eight minutes from the iconic Lionshead Mountain. Clifton, the V&A Waterfront, and the heart of Cape Town are all within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sun-seekers, wine lovers and active travelers will all find plenty to love at Villa Ava. Not only does this stunning Camps Bay vacation rental afford breathtaking ocean views, it’s less than 10 minutes from the area’s best beaches, Lion’s Head, Table Mountain and central Cape Town. Invite up to eight friends and family members to enjoy the stylish living spaces, four bedrooms and atmosphere of relaxed luxury.

A holiday at Villa Ava includes the services of a housekeeper, and—perhaps best of all—six bottles of wine each day. Sip a refreshing glass of white while watching the waves from a lounger beside the pool, or pair a bottle of red with a menu fresh from the barbecue. Entertaining is a breeze thanks to the sound system and TV, while Wi-Fi makes it easy to post photos of your vacation.

Sliding glass doors let you open the living spaces to the terrace for one seamless indoor-outdoor area—and make for uninterrupted ocean views. Vaulted wood ceilings set high above the sleek open-concept sitting and dining areas add to the breezy feel, while a smooth-fronted fireplace lends a touch of coziness. A breakfast bar allows the fully equipped kitchen to be used for socializing, while the kids can sneak off to the separate family room to play.

There are three bedrooms in the main house at Villa Ava and one in a private annex; all four have en-suite bathrooms. Relive your honeymoon in a main-house master suite with a king bed and lounge area with fireplace, or rest comfortably in one of two bedrooms with a queen bed. The annex bedroom features a double bed and its own lounge area.

With Camps Bay Beach a 4-minute drive from the villa and Clifton Beach 5 minutes away by car, you can easily return throughout the day for snacks or forgotten sandals—or spend less time driving and more time surfing and swimming. Go for a hike around Lion’s Head or the Twelve Apostles, both less than 10 minutes away, or take the cableway up Table Mountain. Plan to spend at least an afternoon or evening in the city center of Cape Town, hunting down unique souvenirs or trying out an up-and-coming restaurant.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wall-to-wall glass doorways lead to lush lawns, poolside lounge chairs, and elevated views that capture Capetown’s urban and ocean landscapes at this elegant hillside home. In the backyard, a fragrant floral-wall makes sure the neighbors won’t get jealous when you’re hosting garden parties. Can’t get enough South African sun? The cities best 2 beaches, Clifton and Camps Bay, are minutes away.

The red sofas in the sunken living room create the perfect spot to catch up on some reading while the cool afternoon breeze flows through large sliding doors. Grab yourself a snack in the chic kitchen, decorated in a soothing red pastel and stocked with state of the art appliances. At lunch, grill up something fresh from a local market to enjoy in peace on the master bedroom’s private balcony.

Villa Stanleon’s full-staff, indoor garage, and security system will take any vacation stress away, leaving you time to focus on pool parties, movie nights, and exciting excursions. Television and Wi-Fi will keep you connected, should you desire. And, when the afternoon heat is at its peak, you can always retreat to the air-conditioned bedrooms.

Looking for a great photo-op? The top of Lion’s Head, that mountain on all the postcards, has the best views in Capetown, and it only takes about 90-minutes to hike. Once atop, lay out a blanket for a picnic or reward yourself with lunch from the cafe. Once you’ve made your descent, go shopping, sample local beers, or dance the night away at V&A Waterfront, Capetown’s entertainment capital.   

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated in the lush hilltops of Vrachasi, at the bottom of Mount Kalaritis, this modern villa follows traditional Greek architecture. Every inch of the property is attractive, from its copper-coloured stone accents to slate grey tiles and natural wood décor. Drive 6 minutes into town to discover folklore history at the House of Vrahassi museum before stopping for refreshments at a local café.

Views of the Lasithiotika Mountains (where Zeus was secretly born) and the island of Dia can easily be seen from the extended, sea-facing terrace. An alfresco table for 4 offers an intimate dinner spot where you can savour an authentic meal while drinking in the dramatic sunset beyond. The eco-friendly, sapphire swimming pool operates on salt water electrolysis, recirculating every 1.5 hours. In the basement, you’ll find a games room equipped with a cozy home-cinema and ping pong table. 

Swim and snorkel in the turquoise waters at pristine Volakias Beach—a quaint, pebbled cove located a short drive from Villa Adagio. Unspoiled nature coexists with luxury accommodations in nearby Elounda. The small town features plenty to do, including boutique shopping, dining on fresh fare, and setting sail in the quiet bay. Grab the whole gang and head out for a day trip to Rethymno where charm meets history and cobblestone pathways lead to ancient churches, a picturesque harbour, and a selection of characterful cafés. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Elegant European style meets the incredible South African scenery at Cloud House. The classic lines and comfortable modern interiors of this Cape Town vacation rental are a beautiful contrast to the rugged lines of the Twelve Apostles. The villa’s quiet courtyard is a private place to entertain and relax, but a short walk brings guests to the surf and sand of Camps Bay Beach.

Listen to the waves in the distance and revel in the sunshine in the tucked-away courtyard, which has a lap pool, a lawn large enough for games, a barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. There’s a gym where guests can keep up on their fitness routines while on holiday, an office in case you need to catch up on work and a home theatre where you can enjoy the company of friends and family.

The interiors of Cloud House take inspiration from its name, rendered in shades of white and cream that lend a fresh appeal. Traditional touches such as French doors and columned porches are paired with contemporary pieces such as wicker and Lucite side tables and a sleek fireplace for an eclectic, modern look. The living and dining rooms are angled around the outdoor sitting area, and flow seamlessly into the fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and two with queen beds; all five have en-suite bathrooms. Neutral tones, clean-lined furnishings and large mullioned windows create an atmosphere of quiet luxury in the suites. For larger parties, a sofa bed provides extra accommodations.

With restaurants, shops and bars less than a 15-minute walk away, Cloud House makes it easy to explore this lively oceanfront suburb. You can also stroll to Camps Bay Beach, a stretch of white sand that’s popular with everyone from local families and keen surfers to visiting honeymooners, or drive to Koeël Bay Market, where you’ll find a tempting array of hand-crafted items that make great souvenirs. Of course, a trip to Cape Town wouldn’t be complete without taking in the views from Table Mountain, Lion’s Head or the Twelve Apostles—all less than a 10-minute drive from Cloud House.

listing.listing_description:
Perched at the foot of the Twelve Apostles Mountains, within easy walking distance of Camps Bay Beach, this contemporary masterwork offers panoramic ocean vistas from virtually every living area. Dip into the open-air hot tub and infinity pool, sip South African wine while admiring the sunset, and dine alfresco on chef-made feasts against the looming profile of Table Mountain.

The villa is nestled amid the lush fynbos flora native to the West Cape, enveloping the terrace and interiors with a rustic naturalism. The L-shaped infinity pool wraps around the ample outdoor lounge, inviting serene relaxation under the sun or stars. The alfresco dining area extends from the kitchen, an inspiring venue for memorable meals.

The main formal dining area is positioned inside a wide threshold, enjoying perfectly framed views of the vast Atlantic. A luminous, fully equipped kitchen features chef-ready appliances and easily serves both dining areas. A comfortable, hearth-warmed lounge opens to the terrace through wide glass doors, creating a graceful flow of space during parties or downtime. Air conditioning, heating, excellent media features, and a home gym create a comfortable environment for all guests.

The master suite and primary guest suite command ocean-facing positions on the upper floor, with ensuite bathrooms, private balconies, and breathtaking views. There are 3 guest suites with ensuite bathrooms, and a guestroom with access to a hall bathroom. All of the rooms include air conditioning, safe boxes, and TVs.

Serenity Villa offers one of the finest locations for experiencing the manifold delights of Cape Town. You're about ten minutes on foot from the beach and nightlife of Camps Bay, and within easy driving distance of Clifton Beach, Lion's Head Mountain, and the city's vibrant art and culinary scene.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Fendi Penthouse is a stunning luxury residence within the Kempinski Hotel Bahia, a five-star, beachfront gem on the Costa del Sol of Spain, near the towns of Estepona and Marbella. Ideal for two couples or a family, the apartment features ample outdoor living areas including a hot tub with sweeping sea views, along with superbly equipped interiors with high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment. Each of the two deluxe bedrooms features a king bed and media system with projector and screen. Additionally, guests enjoy access to the hotel’s fabulous amenities, including three shared outdoor swimming pools and a wellness center with gym, sauna, and steam room.

The penthouse is ideally designed for savoring the expansive views and delightful breezes blowing in from the Mediterranean. Relax in the stylish sun bed; dine alfresco at the lovely table for four; and savor a soothing soak in the hot tub as you gaze at the vast horizon. At night, kindle the outdoor fire feature and open a bottle of fine Spanish wine.

Glass doors join the patio with the open-concept interior, inviting delicious air into the home. The open-concept space features a chic yet comfortable lounge with large TV and gas fireplace, as well as a superb kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a bar. Additional features include air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and an excellent sound system.

The exceptional master suite includes a sumptuous king bed, private balcony, mini bar, and open-concept bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and superb soaking tub. The guest room has a king bed and access to a hallway bathroom with steam shower. The sofa in the living room can be folded out as a bed for additional guests.

In addition to the hotel's superb amenities, you'll enjoy proximity to Bahia Beach Club and Andalucía Beach, as well the town of Estepona, famed for its beaches, watersport spots, and beautiful old city. The renowned resort and nightlife destination of Marbella is about thirty kilometers along the coast to the northeast, on the way to Malaga—birthplace of Picasso.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax in the balmy Mediterranean breeze of Crete’s northern coast at this modern, fully-outfitted villa. With a commanding view of the ancient city of Chania, the layout ensures a wealth of space for guests, both inside and out. From the pool, broad terrace with numerous sun spots, or huge interior living space, guests can plan trips to the beaches, ancient ruins and culinary hotspots of Crete.

The Olive Nest Villa has been carefully designed to blend into and hug the rugged landscape of the island, elevated via a natural stone-studded platform to deliver a fantastic view. From here, the soothing breeze ruffles the palapa-style sun shades that dot villa’s lengthy terrace and lawn. The interior offers an attractive, open-plan layout, maximizing the social potential and group-stay aspect of the property. Focussed around a massive, light-catching living space, the villa has been furnished to the most exacting standards, with every room naturally illuminated by splashes of vibrant Grecian sunshine.

The property's enviable location ensures privacy and quiet in the Greek countryside, while also ensuring quick and easy access to Crete and Chania’s coastal highway. Guests can rapidly access the golden beaches that dot the coastline to the north of the villa, or visit the bustling markets, lively squares and scenic harbour of the nearby town. Easily take to the road for day trips to the unique archaeological palaces and temples that dot the east of the island, or visit the high mountain scenery and cool air of the Lefka Ori mountain range, which is visible to the south of the villzl. After a day spent exploring the wealth of Crete’s attractions, return to the peaceful terrace and sip a cool drink or tasty glass of locally-produced ouzo, as the villa’s barbecue gently grills a delicious evening meal in the half-light.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Amelkis is located in a lush park and is a jewel set in a secured luxury community. The property is located on Golf Amelkis, one of Marrakech's premier courses and will certainly delight all golf lovers. This villa can comfortably accommodate up to 12 people, location and quality of this home offer a quiet and convenient stay for golfers and families alike.

With golf, horseback riding and the city just minutes away, Amelkis is the perfect vacation rental for the active and the adventurous. Book tee times at one-or allof the four golf courses within a short walk or drive, or set off from the Royal Equestrian Club. It's well worth taking an afternoon to explore the museums, souks and architecture of Marrakech, but at the very least, sit down to dinner at one of its renowned restaurants.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Otium is a breathtaking luxury villa in the Bab Atlas region of Morocco, about ten kilometers northeast of central Marrakech. The home's exquisite design, décor, and grounds evoke a timeless Moroccan enchantment, while high-end amenities provide contemporary comforts. Six bedrooms include five king suites and a kid-friendly family room for four, providing a perfect haven for reunions with loved-ones. The vacation rental includes the services of a cook, driver, head of staff, and two maids.

The estate's classic pisé walls enclose verdant gardens and trees, with an expansive lawn laying the scene for special ceremonies, memorable receptions, or private hours amid family and friends. The long swimming pool and ample spa are framed in lovely brick, with elegant lounge furniture inviting you to bask in the sunlight or sip cool refreshment's under a parasol. The veranda features a full bar, a salon area with outdoor fireplace, and lovely artwork conjuring the tea houses of traditional Morocco.

Indoors, a luminous and cavernous great room features a wood-burning fireplace, a spacious sitting area, and a circular dining table perched beside impressive bookshelves. Elegant white wall finishes and ceilings accentuate the abundant natural light flowing through lozenge-paned windows. A vintage kitchen is fully equipped with contemporary, chef-grade appliances for your private cook.

Each of the six bedroom suites features a private garden and ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The spectacular master sutie includes a king bed beside a salon with fireplace, and its garden features a private pool. The charming family suite includes four twin beds.

Villa Otium offers an ideal balance of cloistered privacy and convenient proximity to the finest attractions in an around Marrakech. You're less than ten kilometers from the city's heart and about eleven to the Jemaa el-Fna market in the Medina quarter. Golfers are an easy drive to PalmGolf Marrakech Palmeraie and Golf Amelkis. Marrakech-Menara Airport is less than seventeen kilometers away, making it a convenient choice for destination wedding guests or corporate retreats.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the ocean breeze on your face and have the beach at your feet at Beta Beach. Tucked away on the waterfront in Bakoven, this Cape Town vacation rental offers stunning views of Lion’s Head and a location just a short distance from popular beaches. Its spacious outdoor living areas and six bedrooms mean you can entertain up to twelve friends or simply relax with the extended family.

Spend lazy days in the loungers around the swimming pool and laid-back nights around the gas barbecue and firepit. The villa also features a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi, as well as a wine fridge where you can store favorite local vintages and a fireplace that’s perfect for cozying up to.

White walls and large-scale artwork give the interiors of Beta Beach the bright, pared-down feeling of a gallery. Follow the entryway to a spacious living room dominated by a sleek black fireplace surround, a dining area with chic Lucite chairs and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. There’s also a separate prep area with laundry facilities, and a second sitting room on the upper floor of this luxury property.

All six of the villa’s bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms. Several bedrooms have private balconies, and one is designed as an au-pair suite, with its own entrance and kitchenette. Details like sculptural furnishings and fold-away glass walls give the bedrooms modern edge—and views to die for.

The villa enjoys private access to Beta Beach and is just a short drive from Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, where you can join everyone from locals and honeymooners to the jet set on the sand. Don’t miss the chance to hike around Lion’s Head, stroll the V&A Waterfront or explore the Cape Town city center during your holiday.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Choose a magazine-worthy backdrop for your Cape Town getaway at Aquatic Villa. This contemporary Camps Bay vacation rental is set on the slopes of Table Mountain, affords stunning views of the Atlantic and is only a 10-minute walk from the beach. Reserve the entire five-bedroom property for a holiday with friends and extended family, as the three-bedroom Aquatic House or as the two-bedroom Aquatic Penthouse for a honeymoon-style escape.

This luxury property has several levels of terraces facing the ocean, with a swimming pool, plunge pool, sun loungers, a built-in barbecue and two 8-seater al-fresco dining areas on the ground level and a 4-seater on the top floor terrace. Inside, you’ll find a sound system, TV and Wi-Fi, as well as an exercise room and an elevator to whisk you from the garage up to the sea view living areas.

Bright and beautifully appointed, the modern interiors of Aquatic Villa showcase the ocean views and have been featured in magazines from Australia’s Modern Home and Emirates Home in the UAE to Casa Deco in Germany and Habitat in South Africa. Sliding glass doors let you open the great rooms to the terraces, creating seamless indoor-outdoor living areas, while neutral tones and natural textures have refined appeal in the living and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen.

There are three bedrooms in Aquatic House and two in Aquatic Penthouse; all five have king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and balconies or patio. The house has two bedrooms with ocean views and one with garden and mountain views, and both penthouse bedrooms look out over the iconic mountains of Cape Town.

Aquatic Villa is a 5-minute drive or less from both Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, where you’ll find oceanfront restaurants and unique shops along with sand and sea, and a 6-minute drive from Lion’s Head. A 15-minute drive or less will bring you to downtown Cape Town, Table Mountain or the Atlantic Seaboard; go just a few minutes farther to visit the charming V&A Waterfront.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
French gardens lend perfect proportions against the rugged mountains of southern Spain at this stately country home outside Cádiz. Trickling fountains and a square reflecting pool create a formal backdrop for the villa, whose twin wings and tiled roof announce its traditional elegance. Walk 8 minutes to views of Gibraltar from San Roque Golf Club or drive to see it from golden Playa Alcaidesa. 

The manicured gardens make the grounds feel tranquil and private—all the better to have a dip in the swimming pool, lay out with a book on the loungers, and heat up the barbecue for lunch or dinner at the alfresco table for 8. In the evenings, flip on the satellite TV and integrated sound system, and face off against friends and family over the pool table. 

Arched doors lead from the pool terrace into an open-concept dining room and fully equipped kitchen, whose ornate molded fireplace contrasts with the sleek lines of the cabinets. The separate living room invites unwinding on a pair of sofas around a fireplace, and a double-height foyer will impress with its beamed ceilings and mezzanine library. 

This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with queen beds, including a master suite with its own terrace and mountain views, and 3 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each. All 5 have ensuite bathrooms and the same gracefully arched windows, along with neutral tones for a restful feel. 

Though the Sotogrande area doesn’t get the press of many neighboring Costa del Sol resorts, it’s long been a favorite of royals and celebs on holiday. Find out why as you tee off on the two beautifully laid out courses and San Roque Golf Club, an 8-minute walk from this vacation rental, or relive your honeymoon with a stroll along the golden sands of Playa Alcaidesa, 7 kilometers away by car. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to the secluded mountains of South Africa's interior at this colonial home in the wine village of Franschhoek. Lounge on the lawns that surround the central swimming pool. Beyond, fragrant gardens and mature trees provide a fairy-tale-like setting; perfect for afternoon reading or a fire at night. Then, walk 7 minutes into town and sample local wine at some of the country's top restaurants.

 Influences from the English colonial era and traditional Afrikaans/Dutch heritage show off an eclectic atmosphere. An open great room contains the living, kitchen, and dining areas, all decorated in stately furnishings and fixtures. Outside, follow stone pathways through trellis-gates, around water features, and past lush gardens. Before dinner, pick the perfect pairing from the wine cellar.

 After dinner in the formal or alfresco setting, convince the entertainer of the group to perform on the piano. Sit outside in the furnished lounge and sip cocktails while the sunsets. In the mood for a late-night snack? Fire up the pizza oven and craft the perfect pie. The villa includes a full staff to help with all your vacation needs. And, there's an office space if you need to keep up with daily life.

 Franschhoek is well-known to be South Africa's Culinary Capital, with many of the country's top 100 restaurants residing within its valley. See for yourself at internationally-acclaimed restaurants, Reuben's, Foliage, Le Coin Francais, and many more. Cycling and horseback tours are a popular way to see the area's wineries. And, the bustling city of Cape Town is just a short drive towards the coast. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy both city views and a tranquil setting at Kaapzicht. As its name, which translates to “cape view,” suggests, this Oranjezicht vacation rental looks out over Cape Town to the ocean. Its lush, private lot, modern architecture, attentive staff and five suite-style bedrooms create an ambience of relaxed luxury for parties of up to ten friends or family members.

Your holiday at Kaapzicht begins with an airport transfer and welcome basket, and includes chef and housekeeping service throughout your stay. Spend your time lounging by the swimming pool, playing games on the lawn, sipping local wines on the terrace, or prepping meals in the pizza oven and barbecue to serve at the al-fresco dining area. Other amenities range from a sound system, TV and Wi-Fi to a fireplace and wine cellar.

Open-plan living spaces, pared-down furnishings and a mix of stone, brick and wood textures gives the villa a chic yet unpretentious feel. The heart of the home is an L-shaped great room on the second floor, with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, but the ground-level living area is just as inviting.

The villa has five bedrooms, all of which have double beds and en-suite bathrooms. Three of the bedrooms have balconies as well. Like the great room, the bedrooms are welcoming yet minimalist, with clean-lined furnishings, exposed concrete walls and large windows that flood the spaces with light.

With the trendy Higgovale neighborhood at your doorstep and plenty of must-see Cape Town attractions just a short drive away, Kaapzicht is perfect for a family vacation, getaway with friends or even an active honeymoon. It’s less than 10 minutes to Lion’s Head—which is visible from many of the home’s outdoor spaces—and the city center, 10 minutes to the beaches of Clifton and Camps Bay, and less than 15 minutes to the V&A Waterfront and iconic Table Mountain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa des Vents is a gorgeous Moroccan villa situated within the renowned Domaine Royal Palm, just outside the heart of historic Marrakech. The villa offers ample private grounds and exquisite interiors for savoring private time with loved-ones, while the Fairmont Royal Palm offers an extraordinary array of resort amenities, including a spa, a kids' club, restaurants, tennis courts, and the Royal Palm Golf & Country Club. Your private professional staff at the villa include a security guard and cook.

The villa enjoys a lush, cloistered ambiance amid verdant gardens and olive trees, inviting you to dreamy hours under the Moroccan sky. Step into the ample swimming pool for a refreshing dip, and sunbathe on lovely chaises longues. Enjoy games of pétanque on the court as the kids play on the lawn, and gather for refreshments on the rustic veranda. Relish meals alfresco on the canopied patio, and sip tea or wine in the adjoining lounge.

The open-concept interior features a salon area with an expansive sectional sofa for evening gatherings, while an elegant dining table seats twenty for privately prepared feasts. A game table is ideal for after-dinner festivities. Large windows and glass walls offer beautiful views of the gardens, and can be opened to welcome in the garden-kissed air; while the fireplace will keep you toasty on cooler nights. Staff have access to a fully equipped kitchen that includes a Nespresso machine.

Each of the four bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom, safe, and direct access to the gardens or terrace. The master suite includes a queen bed, and its bathroom is equipped with a tub, shower, and dual vanity. Two of the guest suites have queen beds (one of which can be arranged as two singles), and one has a double bed.

The Fairmont Royal Palm boasts some of the finest resort amenities in Morocco. Enjoy games of tennis or world-class golf; treat yourself to a relaxing spa session; and dine at one of its four restaurants. The resort's outdoor spaces can be reserved for special events. Beyond the Fairmont, you're within easy reach of the historic center of Marrakech, including the famous Medina quarter and the Majorelle Garden. Marrakech Menara Airport is just fourteen kilometers away.

listing.listing_description:
Located in one of Southern Spain's most prestigious gated communities, Villa Rio Verde enjoys a secluded atmosphere with privacy provided by lush local greenery. Within the communities gates, you'll find a golf course and tennis courts. Just beyond, the beautiful city of Marbella and the Costa del Sol are ready to play host to your exciting nights on the town, afternoon shopping trips, and unforgettable dining experiences. And, all of this is located within eight kilometers of Villa Rio Verde's luxurious estate.

Spanish colonial revivalist architecture has always been the ideal style for open-air homes in warm climates, and at Villa Rio Verde you'll see all of its iconic character traits. At the villa's center, there's a serene courtyard with a fountain; it connects several of the common areas. Exposed wood beams, terracotta roof tiles, and vaulted ceilings give Rio Verde a spacious, earthy feel, while elegant designer furniture and high tech electronics provide modern luxury. Nearly all of the interior common spaces and bedrooms have large openings to the terrace, creating a free-flowing environment. And, in the kitchen, you'll love the functional layout, granite counters, and high-end appliances.

Outside, the covered terrace acts more like a second living room with its two couches, a sun bed, sitting areas, and fireplace. Between the covered terrace and the main house, you'll find vibrant green lawns and a refreshing swimming pool. And, back inside, unique spaces like the home theatre, media room, pool table, fitness room, and sauna will keep guests engaged and entertained.

The nearest beachfront is Playa Puerto Banus. At just under two-kilometers, you'll be working on your tan in no time. The beach is protected by a breakwater, so the swimming cove is calm, perfect for children and first-time snorkelers. The white sandy shores are lined with beach facilities, lounger and parasol rentals, and delicious beachfront restaurants. In the town of Marbella, you'll find beautiful ancient architecture, high-end shopping, Casino Marbella, and numerous tourism activities and excursions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This sensational luxury villa just south of Cape Town enjoys sublime ocean views from its privileged perch in the highlands of Clifton, just minutes from Camps Bay. Designed by SAOTA architecture firm, the extraordinary contemporary home features spectacular alfresco and interior living spaces, high-end amenities for entertainment, fitness, and cuisine, and five deluxe bedroom suites. Its ideal location places you within minutes of the city, the Twelve Apostle Mountain Range, and some of the finest beaches on the Western Cape of South Africa. The vacation rental includes a chef, housekeeping, and airport transfer.

The extraordinary terrace gazes out over sublime, panoramic vistas of the Atlantic Ocean and the stylish coastal towns below. Beautiful terrace gardens bring the exquisite natural riches of the coastline into your home, while the stunning archway creates a feeling of monumental tranquility above the waves. Enjoy dreamy days floating in the infinite swimming pool and relaxing on elegant sun loungers beneath parasols. Sip sunset cocktails in the ample lounge under parasols.

The open wall joining the terrace and interior great room creates an expansive, seamless space for relaxation and entertainment, with cool ocean breezes circulating throughout the home. The great room includes a large, ocean-facing cocktail lounge, an adjacent seating area with TV, an elegant bar, and a fabulous dining table for ten. Lush gardens outside the opposite glass wall evoke an ambiance of sylvan, seaside serenity.

The villa's five superb bedroom suites all feature sumptuous queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, each with stand-alone shower and tub. The master suite gazes out on breathtaking ocean views and includes a large TV and desk. Its ensuite bathroom features a lovely, ocean-view tub, while its private balcony is furnished with supple armchairs. Three of the four guest suites share a balcony and lounge area, while the other enjoys views of the sea.

There is hardly a better location near Cape Town than here, with the city center less than fifteen minutes away, the world-class beaches of Camps Bay and Clifton just six minutes down the hill, and the extraordinary peaks of the Twelve Apostles Mountains within ten minutes of your door. Cape Town International Airport is about twenty-five minutes away, making Pentagon a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a one-of-a-kind family holiday in the sun at Ino Villa. This Crete vacation rental is set on its own private acre of gardens in the town of Perama, with plenty of outdoor living areas to enjoy the warm weather and the dramatic scenery surrounding the property. Plus, it’s just a short drive from the beach and top attractions such as the Arkadi monastery.

The villa’s sun-splashed outdoor living areas feature a pool, basketball and volleyball court, children’s play area, a pizza oven and barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. After a day spent sunbathing by the pool or exploring the town, unwind by the ping-pong table and video games, flip on the TV or share photos of your day via Wi-Fi.

Sleek, stylish and spacious, Ino Villa is a haven of modern luxury, with polished tile floors and dark wood accents. Its central open-concept great room invites you to gather on tufted sofas and chairs in the sitting area or around a dining table for eighteen. The galley-style kitchen, set along one wall of the space, is fully equipped.

The villa has a variety of accommodations to suit any group of up to twenty-six. There are two bedrooms with a double bed, sofa bed and cot; three bedrooms with a double bed and sofa bed; two bedrooms with two twin beds and sofa bed each; one bedroom with two twin beds, sofa bed and cot; and one bedroom with two twin beds. All nine bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Thanks to its location in Perama, Ino Villa is close to shopping, dining and more. It’s close enough to spend an afternoon at Spilies Beach, pop into the resort town of Skaleta for a honeymoon-worthy dinner by the sea or take a day trip to the monastery of Arkadi.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set yourself up for a wonderful seaside holiday at Casa di Mare. This stunning Crete vacation rental is in the village of Skaleta just outside Rethymno, close to beautiful beaches and lively towns. Its five bedrooms and range of amenities invite you and up to twelve friends or family members to spend a week or two in sun-splashed luxury.

Begin your stay with a complimentary welcome basket, then settle in on one of the loungers overlooking the ocean from a spot by the infinity pool or send the kids to work off some energy on the private playground. Enjoy some friendly competition inside around the ping-pong table, relax with the help of the wine fridge and sauna, or watch the stars come out from the al-fresco jetted tub. The villa also has a TV, Wi-Fi and laundry facilities.

The open-concept great room at Casa di Mare stretches nearly the length of the house, from the front terrace to the backyard. Its sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen get a sleek, cool look from an all-white color scheme that’s warmed up by a wood table and breakfast bar.

The villa has two bedrooms with double beds—one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a shared bathroom—and one bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a double bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a bathroom with en-suite access from both rooms.

Casa di Mare is located in the village of Skaleta, which has a sandy beach ideal for honeymoon-style strolls, a choice of cafes and bars, and a bus stop that makes it easy to access other towns nearby. It’s also a short drive from a grocery store, bakery and more in the towns of Sfakaki and Stavromenos, more shopping and dining in Rethymno, and the historic Monastery of Arkadi.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
